trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Westminster
There were 2 other sightings in Westminster on or around September 11th 2005
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in the living room and had just raised the shades of the west of the house. As I sat watching TV I noticed this object out of the corner of my eye. I got up and walked to the window and watched a few seconds, turned away and walked across the room to get a pair of binoculers but when I looked at the object, I could not make out any more details. Never saw anything like it but first described it as a bullet shape and someone just told me: cylinder. I hesitated in reporting it but I'm wondering if anyone else saw it....like west of the mountains.
Summary: Large cylinder shaped white, firey object from south to west traveling fast and disappearing behind high dark rain clouds
